Name: I.V.F Martini
Ingredients: 15 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
Instructions: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into glass. FLOAT cream on drink.
Review: Creamy, sweetened absinthe and coffee - hardcore but tasty.
History: Created by Giovanni Burdi, London, England. In this case I.V.F stands for 'Italy v France', not 'in vitro fertilisation'.
Nutrition: One serving of I.V.F Martini contains 262 calories
